page.title: 16VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Folly Gate has got a{Village Hall } which is used for many events during the year. It is looked after by Mrs. Orchard who is the caretaker. The village people hold functions in it. They have a{Whist Drive}three times a year which is a type of card game where they have lots of tables with people playing cards on them and when one person wins he or she moves to the next table. All the money goes to the football club, the darts team and the church, so it's all in a good cause. They also hold parties like birthdays, Christmas and christenings. In September they have a Harvest Festival.{Eggesford Hunt}have a meet at the Crossways Inn and they hold{ a dance the night before in the {Village Hall.}In the winter Bob Cann and his Dartmoor Pixie Group give lessons on square dancing.
